document_data.mainbody:
ila was a traveling musician, performer, and a bard on the Sword Coast North circa 1374 DR.
Lila was a short and slender elven woman with large brown and chestnut braided hair. She wore a green performers garb. She was a cold and aloof demeanor that strangely contrasted her vocation.
In the , Lila, a flautist, was a part of a roguish band of traveling performers that included Venn who played a lute, William – a tambourinist, and the troupes leader, a flaming dancer named Azahr. Lila and the band spent some time performing at the Crossroad Keep as it was being reinvigorated by trade and commerce after a devastating Shadow War. The bands leader was happy to be making coin once again and planned on staying at the keep for a little while. However, that time was cut short after Azahr sole a precious artifact – Gauntlets of Ironfist, from the keeps seneschal. Lila accompanied her bandmates to Azahrs cabin hideout in the Neverwinter Wood. Khelgar Ironfist sent a group of adventurers to retrieve the precious stolen magic item a brawl was ensured.
